column6: ROGUE & GAMBIT...together at last? WOLVERINE face-to-face-to-face with CYBER and OMEGA RED! All orchestrated by THE SHADOW QUEEN! Battleworld's most '90sest district's tubular tale keeps rocking!
column8: | writer:Chad Bowers | writer:Chris Sims | artist:Scott Koblish | penciller (cover):Pepe Larraz
